summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the creation, serialization, and behavior of various Raster Vision task configurations—including chip classification, object detection, and semantic segmentation—ensuring they correctly handle protobuf conversion, configuration validation, and area-of-interest constraints.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of geospatial machine‑learning task definitions within the Raster Vision platform, reducing errors in model training and inference pipelines.
